Life@AHIBS
----------

### **Experience the Best of** **Academic and Campus Life**

AHIBS is located at both of UTM’s campuses in Kuala Lumpur and Johor Bahru, Malaysia. Its headquarter in Kuala Lumpur is strategically located within the heart of business and commercial districts in Malaysia, which offers AHIBS wide access to many large corporations and business communities. Our students at the Kuala Lumpur campus learn against a backdrop of vibrant cultural melting pots and contemporary development in Malaysia. While in Johor Bahru, AHIBS is located at UTM’s main campus, tucked inside over 1000 hectares of green ecosystem.

**Modern Facilities  
**
------------------------

AHIBS offers state-of-the-art facilities to enhance your learning experience and personal development. Our facilities include:

[![](https://business.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Facilities-bonding-space.jpg "Facilities - bonding space")](https://business.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Facilities-bonding-space.jpg)

#### Bonding Space (Students Lounge)

This is a relaxing area where students can unwind, socialize, and build connections with their peers. The lounge is designed to create a comfortable environment for casual interactions and informal study sessions

[![](https://business.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Facilities-The-ACT-Lab.jpg "Facilities - The ACT-Lab")](https://business.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Facilities-The-ACT-Lab.jpg)

#### The ACT Lab

A cutting-edge lab dedicated to collaborative and innovative projects. This space is equipped with the latest technology to support creative thinking and teamwork, making it ideal for group projects and research activities.

[![](https://business.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Facilities-CBH.jpg "Facilities - CBH")](https://business.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Facilities-CBH.jpg)

#### Capacity Building Hub (CBH)

This hub is dedicated to professional development and capacity-building activities. It provides resources and support for students and corporates looking to enhance their skills and prepare for leadership roles.

[![](<Base64-Image-Removed>)](https://business.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Facilities-syndicate-rooms.jpg)

#### Syndicate Rooms

Perfect for group study sessions and collaborative work, these rooms are designed to foster teamwork and collective problem-solving.

[![](https://business.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Facilities-Kaizen.jpg "Facilities - Kaizen")](https://business.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Facilities-Kaizen.jpg)

#### Kaizen Room

An ideal setting for meetings and brainstorming sessions, the Kaizen Room is equipped with everything needed for productive discussions and planning.

[![](https://business.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Facilities-staff-lounge.jpg "Facilities - staff lounge")](https://business.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Facilities-staff-lounge.jpg)

#### Staff Lounge

A comfortable space for our dedicated staff to relax and recharge. The staff lounge provides a welcoming environment for faculty and administrative staff to take a break and connect

[![](<Base64-Image-Removed>)](https://business.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Facilities-gym.jpg)

#### Gym

Stay fit and healthy with our well-equipped gym facilities. The gym is available for all students and staff, offering a range of equipment for various fitness needs.

[![](<Base64-Image-Removed>)")](https://business.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Facilities-lecture-room-small.jpg)

#### Lecture Room (Small)

Our small lecture rooms are equipped with modern technology to facilitate effective learning, providing a conducive environment for intimate and interactive sessions, accommodating a smaller group of students.

[![](<Base64-Image-Removed>)")](https://business.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Facilities-lecture-room-big.jpg)

#### Lecture Room (Big)

Our big lecture rooms are equipped with modern technology to facilitate effective learning, offering a conducive environment for large-scale lectures and dynamic discussions, accommodating a large number of students.

**Facilities Booking  
**
-------------------------

Explore our exclusive AHIBS facilities, available for booking by both our staff and external users. Non-AHIBS users can reserve the Big Lecture Room, Small Lecture Room, or Capacity Building Hub (CBH) for programs, meetings, and events. AHIBS staff have additional access to the Kaizen Room and Bonding Space for internal meetings, team-building sessions, and more. To secure your preferred space, simply [click here](https://business.utm.my/booking-ahibs/)
 to access our booking page and check availability.

### **Be Part of AHIBS Community**

At AHIBS, community lies at the heart of our corporate culture. Our extensive alumni network serves as a testament to our commitment to fostering enduring connections and professional growth. Engage with us on social media platforms to stay abreast of industry trends and forge valuable relationships within our dynamic community. Whether you’re a current student seeking guidance, a seasoned graduate offering mentorship, or an enthusiastic supporter, our community welcomes you to embark on this enriching journey with us.
